name: Evergreen Island
description:
Part of a University Game Jam around sustainability. With the added theme of "Energy"
Here is a click-based island game where you need to place renewable energy sources to get money to place even more energy sources.

We only had 36 hours to make the game so there may be issues, there are around 6 achievements in the game and once you have them all you have completed the game! (Or you can keep playing to make more money).

Audio: John Wilkinson

3D Artist: Elizabeth Baird

Programming: Saul Bookey

2D Artist: Alex Farmer

Press Escape to Quit the Game
